mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_member (memberId, pwd, name, email, phone, birthday, addr1, addr2, zipCode) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{birthday}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{zipCode})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_member SET email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, addr1 = #{addr1}, addr2 = #{addr2}, zipCode = #{zipCode} WHERE memberId = #{memberId}
